scripts.build:components:less: cd src/packages/components/common/css && lessc bg-gradient-t.less > ../../styles/kviewui/bg-gradient-t.css && lessc bg-gradient-tr.less > ../../styles/kviewui/bg-gradient-tr.css && lessc bg-gradient-r.less > ../../styles/kviewui/bg-gradient-r.css && lessc bg-gradient-br.less > ../../styles/kviewui/bg-gradient-br.css && lessc bg-gradient-b.less > ../../styles/kviewui/bg-gradient-b.css && lessc bg-gradient-bl.less > ../../styles/kviewui/bg-gradient-bl.css && lessc bg-gradient-l.less > ../../styles/kviewui/bg-gradient-l.css && lessc bg-gradient-tl.less > ../../styles/kviewui/bg-gradient-tl.css
scripts.generate:components:css: cd src/packages/components/scripts && gulp less && node --max_old_space_size=4096 appendFile.js
scripts.generate:animate:css: cd src/packages/animate/scripts && gulp less && node --max_old_space_size=4096 appendFile.js
scripts.build:animate: npm run generate:animate:css && npm run build:animate:ts
